source: your movement break for your brain, body...
target: みんな、体とあたまを動かして～

source: Today, we've got a very special mission.
target: 今日は特別なミッションがあるよ。

source: A whole lot of different types of fruit have gotten lost in Candyland,
target: フルーツたちがキャンディとうで 迷子になったんだ！

source: and we need to save them from all that sugar.
target: 砂糖からフルーツを守らなきゃ

source: Now, a little bit of sugar is OK,
but a whole land made of
target: しま全部が、砂糖でできてるのは

source: Luckily, we have a map to help us find our way.
target: 地図を見てフルーツをさがそう！

source: the bananas are stuck in the candy cane and lollipop forest.
target: バナナはローリーポップの森に、いるみたいだね。

source: Wow, these candy canes are so tall,
target: わぁ、なんてでかいキャンディ棒だ！

source: and the bananas are stuck right at the top.
target: バナナは一番上に、いるみたいだけど…

source: How did they even get there?
target: どうやって上にいったんだろう？

source: we're going to shake the candy cane just like this
target: キャンディ棒をこんな風に

source: as hard as you can, moving your whole body.
target: 体全体を動かしながら揺らしてみて

source: And then as the bananas fall,
target: バナナが落ちてきたら、

source: we're going to do star jumps on the spot j
target: その場で、こんな風にスタージャンプを

source: And then they're going to plop into our magic bag.
target: そしたらマジックバッグに飛び込んでくるよ。

source: That's a big candy cane. Come on.
target: みんな頑張っていくよ～

source: OK, last one on this one.
Into our bag, nice and safe.
Let's move to the next candy cane.
target: よし、次のキャンディー棒に、

source: Ready, and shake as hard as you can.
Come on, move your whole body.
Remember, this is far enough. Let's go, let's go.
And the last one's on its way.
And we got them. Yes, kids.
Into our bag, nice and safe.
target: マジックバッグにいれて～。

source: and head to the next area.
Now the map says the apples are at the top of Mount Gumdrop.
target: リンゴはあめ山のてっぺんにいるみたいだね。

source: We're going to have to get all the way to the top
Gumdrops are rolling down as we're going to go up.
target: 飴が転がってくるから

source: We're going to have to miss them all
and get right to the top.
we're going to sprint on the spot just like this,
target: その場で、全力ダッシュを

source: we're going to hop over them, just like this.
target: 僕みたいにジャンプしてね。

source: we're going to have to start quick.
target: 全力でダッシュしていこう！！

source: This is a big mountain. So the faster we go,
target: 全力を尽くしてリンゴを

source: the quicker we can get to the top.
So let me give you max energy. Come on, kids.
target: みんな、一緒に頑張ろう！

source: OK, now come the first gumdrops.
Excellent work, kids. Now sprint again.
target: 次はその場でダッシュ！

source: Come on, let's go, let's go, let's go.
All the way to the top.
I can see one or two more gumdrops left.
I guess they're just enjoying the nice view.
target: どうやら景色を楽しんでるみたいだね

source: Now the next fruit on the map are mangoes, and it looks like they're hiding in a cupcake maze.
target: 次はマンゴーを助けに行くよ！地図によるとカップケーキの迷路に隠れているみたいだね。

source: those are some pretty cheeky mangoes.
target: いたずら好きのマンゴーたちを

source: To find them, we're going to do scissor kicks on the spot like this,
target: 見つけるために僕の動きを真似して、

source: and then you're going to follow my directions.
We're either going to go straight,
this is a big maze, so we're going to have to use max effort to find them all.
target: とてもでかい迷路だけど、あきらめずに頑張ろうね。

source: Wow, that's a lot of cupcakes.
target: わぁ、すごい量のカップケーキだ

source: Come on, you little cheeky mango.
You're not going to get away from us.
Oh, this is tough work, isn't it?
target: だんだん疲れてきたね

source: Speed it up. Let's go, let's go.
Come on, cheeky mango, we're going to get you.
target: 捕まえるぞ～、マンゴ～ちゃん！

source: Come on, kids, this is fired up. Let's go.
Glad those cheeky mangoes are in our bag.
target: やっとマンゴー達がそろったね

source: Now to get out of here.
target: ここからどうやって出るんだ。

source: According to our map, the grapes are on Candy Floss Lane. Let's head over.
target: 地図によると、ブドウ達はワタ飴の道に、 いるみたいだね、行ってみよう。

source: it looks like our little grape friends are stuck in a
target: ブドウは、ワタ飴にひっついてしまったみたいだね。

source: To do that, we're going to bounce on one leg like this,
target: じゃ、私みたいにカタ足でスクワットして

source: and put it in the bag.
All right, let's reach down to grab the grape.
target: ぶどうを取るために手を下に出して～、

source: okay, now this floss is sticky,

target: すごいひっつきぐあい！

source: Okay, we've got to be gentle, they're just grapes.
target: ブドウだから、やさしくね

source: these silly grapes, they should never be allowed to wander around all by themselves.
target: このブドウたち、もう絶対ひとりでうろうろさせないんだから。

source: I'm glad we got them all.
target: 全員助けれてよかった。

source: According to the map, our last fruit, the pineapple, is bobbing around in the chocolate river.
target: 地図によると、最後のフルーツ、パイナップルがチョコレートの川でプカプカ浮いてるみたい。
いいアイデアがあるよ

source: Let's hop on our chocolate slab
and use a lollipop to row them out
target: ロリポップを使って、探しにいこう。

source: before they get way too soggy.
target: この板がとけちゃうまでにね

source: and then take your giant lollipop
target: それから、巨大なロリポップをもって、

source: and row on either side of your body just like this to get the pineapples out.
target: わたしみたいにロリポップを漕いで、パイナップルを助け出そう。

source: All right, hold on to your lollipop.
target: ロリポップをしっかり持って～。

source: Side to side across the body just like that.
target: 体の横でこんなふうに動かしてね
あっ、最初のパイナップル発見！

source: I mean, it looks like a pineapple spot here.
target: 何だかパイナップルのいえみたいだね。

source: They look so relaxed in this chocolate river.
target: 自分の家みたいにリラックスしてるよ。

source: I could do with a cheeky taste.
target: ちょっとだけ味見してみたいな
もうひとつ見つけたよ

source: All right, let's row a little bit faster.
target: ちょっと速く漕いでみよう。
みんな、お腹に力入れて

source: Oh, this chocolate looks so yummy.
target: お、このチョコは美味しそう

source: Yes, we got the last one.
Great rowing, kids. We have them all.
target: よく頑張ったね、全部つかまえたよ。

source: And we used a chocolate slab and a lollipop.
target: チョコレートの板とロリポップを使ったのは

source: Well done, team. We've saved all the fruit.
target: 全部のフルーツを救えたね！！！！！！

source: Now, according to the map, the only way to get out of Candyland and to keep these fruits safe is to go across the Biscuit Bridge.
target: 地図によると、キャンディとうを抜けてフルーツを守るためには、ビスケットの橋を渡るしかないみたい。

source: Sounds pretty cool. All right, let's grab the bag, everyone.
target: すごく面白そうだね！じゃあ、みんな、バッグを持って

source: Now, I've got a bit of a crazy idea.
target: みんな聞いて、私に面白いアイデアがあるの。

source: We made it across the Biscuit Bridge,
target: ビスケットの橋を渡ったけど、

source: but what if we now smash the Biscuit Bridge
target: フルーツがこっそり入っていって

source: to keep all of our fruit nice and safe
target: きけんな目に合わないように

source: and to keep them from sneaking in all the time?
target: この橋を壊しちゃおう！

source: Luckily, we've got this Popsicle as a hammer
target: 橋を壊すためにこのアイスキャンディーを

source: that we can use to smash it.
All right, to do that, we're gonna pick up our Popsicle
target: じゃあ、アイスキャンディーをもって～、

source: and then do a figure of eight
target: こんなふうに八の字を

source: smash the bridge just like that.
All right, pick up your Popsicle.
target: アイスキャンディーを持って～。

source: Figure of eight, nice and controlled.
target: 八の字を上手に描いて
スクワットして壊していくよ～。

source: Okay, this is a really strong bridge.
target: この橋はすっごく手ごわいね。

source: Come on, everyone. We've gotta keep the fruit safe
target: もうちょっと！みんなとフルーツを守るために
しゃがんで、スマッシュ！

source: Figure of eight, nice and controlled.
Can't believe we have a Popsicle as a hammer.
target: アイスキャンディがハンマーなんて、

source: Here we go, it's starting to crumble.
Okay, one more time. Come on, it's almost there.

target: みんな、もうちょっとだよ！

source: That biscuit bridge didn't stand a
target: 手ごわいビスケットの橋だったのに、

source: And some would say that's how the biscuit crumbles.
target: みんな、よくあきらめずに戦えたね

source: Now that was a fruit-alicious adventure.
target: 今回はフルーツいっぱいの冒険だったね！

source: For our first cool it exercise,
target: リラックスするために、

source: we're going to do sunshine breath.
target: サンシャイン呼吸を、するよ。

source: So you can imagine you're a big, warm, bright sun.
target: 大きくて、明るい太陽になったイメージをして。

source: Sitting in a comfortable position, just like this,
target: こんなふうに、楽な姿勢で座ってね

source: you can breathe in through your nose.
Imagine you're that sun that's just getting bigger.
target: 大きくなっていく太陽をイメージして～、

source: And then as you breathe out through your mouth,
target: そして口から息をはこう。

source: you're going to spread your warm rays of sunshine all over.
target: あったかい太陽の光をみんなに届けてあげよう。

source: And then breathe out through your mouth.
Imagine those rays spreading all around you.
target: みんなに太陽の光を届けるイメージで

source: Go again. In through your nose.
Imagine the rays getting brighter and warmer each time you breathe out.
target: 呼吸をするたび、太陽がよりあたたかくなってる事をイメージして。

source: You can also send those sunshine rays to someone that you love.
target: 太陽の光を自分の大切な人に届けてみよう。

source: What a great way to calm your mind and body down.
target: 心と体を落ち着かせるには最高の方法だね。

source: And you get to spread some sunshine around.
target: 太陽の光をみんなに届けて～。

source: For our final cool it exercise,
we're going to do cat-cow breathing.
To do that, we're going to go down onto all fours,
target: こんな風に、よつんばいに

source: And then when you breathe in through your nose,
you're going to arch your back and look up like a cow.
target: 背中をそらして、うしみたいに上を見てみよう。

source: And then when you breathe out through your mouth,
target: 口から息をはくときは、

source: you're going to arch your back the other way like a cat.
target: 猫みたいに、反対側に背中をそらすよ。

source: And then all the way out through your mouth.
Remember to tuck your chin in.
target: 顎もしっかりひっこめて

source: You can close your eyes if you want to.
target: 目を閉じても大丈夫だよ。

source: It's like a good stretch and breathing at the same time.
target: とてもいいストレッチだね。

source: That's a great stretch to do any time.
target: いつしても、とてもいいストレッチだよ！

source: Now, remember to always keep an eye on your fruit.
target: みんな、フルーツ達がどこにも行かないように

source: You never know if they might wander off.
target: フルーツから、目を離さないようにしてね,,,,,
